OrgName.entry: CREATIVE SHEFFIELD - INFORMATION FOR SMALL BUSINESS

Desc.entry: Provides information on industrial and office properties (not retail) available, and sources of help and assistance. Offers advice on the development climate and the promotion of development opportunities. The office acts as a single contact point which has the ability to draw on expertise as needed from the relevant departments and agencies. Offers signposting facility for sources of financial assistance. Inward investment agency for Sheffield, in partnership with Sheffield City Council.
